body:
### Problem

Looks like a continuation of https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/23365.

Running, 

```bash
$ brew install --HEAD neovim
==> Downloading https://formulae.brew.sh/api/formula.jws.json
######################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Downloading https://formulae.brew.sh/api/cask.jws.json
######################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Fetching neovim
==> Downloading https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/66d94fba2a259ec9236824307a4c117f35fb6351/Formula/n/neovim.rb
Already downloaded: /Users/charlie/Library/Caches/Homebrew/downloads/88340cb558e01170bd6cf500afc532a2559ed34eb118ea9233fac378ba8d9897--neovim.rb
==> Cloning https://github.com/neovim/neovim.git
Updating /Users/charlie/Library/Caches/Homebrew/neovim--git
From https://github.com/neovim/neovim
   131a1ee82..3afbf4745  master     -> origin/master
==> Checking out branch master
Already on 'master'
Your branch is behind 'origin/master' by 2 commits, and can be fast-forwarded.
  (use "git pull" to update your local branch)
HEAD is now at 3afbf4745 Merge pull request #25024 from bfredl/luacheck2
==> cmake -S . -B build -DLUV_LIBRARY=/opt/homebrew/opt/luv/lib/libluv.dylib -DLIBUV_LIBRARY=/opt/homebrew/opt/libuv/lib/libuv.dylib
Last 15 lines from /Users/charlie/Library/Logs/Homebrew/neovim/01.cmake:
-- Performing Test CMAKE_HAVE_LIBC_PTHREAD
-- Performing Test CMAKE_HAVE_LIBC_PTHREAD - Success
-- Found Threads: TRUE  
-- Found Libuv: /opt/homebrew/opt/libuv/lib/libuv.dylib (Required is at least version "1.28.0") 
-- Found Luv: /opt/homebrew/opt/luv/lib/libluv.dylib (Required is at least version "1.43.0") 
-- Found Iconv: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk/usr/include  
CMake Error at /opt/homebrew/Cellar/cmake/3.27.4/share/cmake/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:230 (message):
  Could NOT find Lpeg (missing: LPEG_LIBRARY)
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /opt/homebrew/Cellar/cmake/3.27.4/share/cmake/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:600 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  cmake/FindLpeg.cmake:3 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  src/nvim/CMakeLists.txt:29 (find_package)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!

READ THIS: https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting

neovim's formula was built from an unstable upstream --HEAD.
This build failure is expected behaviour.
Do not create issues about this on Homebrew's GitHub repositories.
Any opened issues will be immediately closed without response.
Do not ask for help from Homebrew or its maintainers on social media.
You may ask for help in Homebrew's discussions but are unlikely to receive a response.
Try to figure out the problem yourself and submit a fix as a pull request.
We will review it but may or may not accept it.```

Gives me an error. I checked brew doctor, and I got no errors.

```
$ brew doctor
Please note that these warnings are just used to help the Homebrew maintainers
with debugging if you file an issue. If everything you use Homebrew for is
working fine: please don't worry or file an issue; just ignore this. Thanks!

Warning: Some installed formulae are deprecated or disabled.
You should find replacements for the following formulae:
  exa
  sphinx

Warning: Some taps are not on the default git origin branch and may not receive
updates. If this is a surprise to you, check out the default branch with:
  git -C $(brew --repo iina/mpv-iina) checkout master```
  
  I'm not sure what more information I can provide. I tried upgrading brew and installing the new formula. It just doesn't work for me, and I"m not sure why. I should have all the dependencies 

### Steps to reproduce

brew install --HEAD neovimn

### Expected behavior

I should be able to install neovim nightly using brew --head

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

Now on 9.1, but I was on nightly yesterday.

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

NA

### Operating system/version

macOS Ventura 13.5.1

### Terminal name/version

Kitty

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

brew
title: homebrew: "Could NOT find Lpeg (missing: LPEG_LIBRARY)" on MacOS m1 pro
